list_definition.definition: sugar melted and browned, used for flavouring/flavoring

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This sauce is flavoured/flavored with caramel.

list_definition.definition: a sweet/candy made with sugar, butter etc, a toffee

The common name chocolate lily alludes to the scent of the flowers which resembles chocolate, caramel or vanilla.
They are made in chocolate and caramel frosted varieties and have a confectionery custard filling.
The bar consists of layers of wafer, caramel, and chocolate creme, and is covered in chocolate, and is suitable for a vegetarian diet.

Caramel is produced from commercially available nutritive sweeteners consisting of fructose, dextrose (glucose), invert sugar, sucrose, malt syrup, molasses, starch hydrolysates and fractions thereof.
